summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: ZILING Straight Lace Front Wigs Human Hair 4x4 Lace Closure Wigs for Black Women Pre Plucked 150% Density Brazilian Straight Lace Front Closure Wigs Human Hair 18 Inch Review Date: 2022/01/31 Store: ZILING Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Material': 'Human', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Tangle Free', 'Brand': 'ZILING', 'Package Dimensions': '11.34 x 9.06 x 2.48 inches; 6 Ounces'} Review Text: The hair is soft and layered so it feels more like 130 density. It measured longer than 18” but it has short hairs throughout as shown in the photos. The lace is more of a light brown with small knots and the hairline is pre-plucked. The cap is well constructed and it’s small head friendly (circumferences less than 22”). Overall, it’s soft with a silky straight texture but the density is just too thin for my personal preference. Review Title: Soft but thin Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: AOA Studio Collection Makeup Sponge Set Makeup Blender Latex Free and High-definition Set of 5 Makeup Blender For Powder Cream and Liquid, Super Soft Wonder Blender Beauty Cosmetic Beveled Review Date: 2022/03/14 Store: AOA STUDIO Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AOA STUDIO', 'Color': 'Ivory', 'Material': 'Rubber', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '6.85 x 5.39 x 1.97 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '850022931338'} Review Text: These makeup sponges are super soft which makes it great for a flawless makeup application.

The flat side allows me to dab my liquid foundation before evenly applying it over my face. It also allows me to use my foundation more sparingly to avoid being wasteful. But I particularly love the precision tip which enables me to effortlessly contour & blend concealer around my eyes, nose & lip areas.

These AOA Studio Collection Makeup sponges makes applying makeup perfectly easy. Review Title: Super Soft & Blends well! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: OxygenCeuticals 360 Eye Perfection Duo, Advanced Anti-Aging Eye Treatment Set, 2 Products, Eye Cream 35ml/18 oz & Eye Gel Serum 15ml/0.5 oz, Visibly Reduce Under-Eye Bags, Puffiness, Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Fine Lines & Crow's Feet, for Women & Men Review Date: 2022/03/18 Store: OxygenCeuticals Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Anti-Aging', 'Use for': 'Eyes', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Special Ingredients': 'Adenosine, Niacinamide, Hydrolyzed collagen', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.67 x 0.67 x 5.71 inches; 7.05 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'OCR700000'} Review Text: This OxygenCeuticals Eye Perfection Duo is the PERFECT COMBINATION! It comes with 1.18fl.oz of Contour Firming Eye Cream and 0.5fl.oz of Age-Defying Eye Serum. It also included sample packets of some of their other products.

I’ve been using it around my eyes as well as my fine “smile” lines around my mouth for about two weeks now. Even though my lines aren’t deeply set or that visible, I still use this as a preventative maintenance.

I haven’t experienced any irritation and It really is fast-absorbing! It’s so lightweight that I’m able to apply my makeup right after using it. It glides on smoothly and leaves those above mentioned areas feeling soothingly hydrated & moisturized. Review Title: PERFECT Combination for beauty maintenance! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: AllWell Beauty Masking Kit | Moisturizing Exfoliating Botanical Radiant Face and Body Mask | With Red Maple, Safflower, & Lavender | Made in the USA | Vegan, Cruelty-Free | 3.38 Fl Oz. Jar + Applicator (Self Care Kit) Review Date: 2022/05/03 Store: AllWell AllOver Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AllWell AllOver', 'Scent': 'Lavender', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Unit Count': '3.38 Ounce', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Dimensions': '5.25 x 4.25 x 4.13 inches; 12.31 Ounces', 'UPC': '850012824275'} Review Text: The Allwell Beauty Self Care Kit comes beautifully packaged which is suitable for gift giving. It includes the mask, a silicone brush & a super soft headband that my daughter confiscated for her personal use…

The mask has a very thick consistency but it surprisingly glided on smoothly with the silicone brush. It felt cool and soothing initially but I did experience a lil tingling sensation during my 15 min wait time. When it was time to rinsing it off, it had harden so it was dry, flakey and quite messy. However, my skin in that small test area did feel softer & more moisturized.

With that said, it effectively works to hydrate & soften my skin. But just be mindful that it is as messy as it looks…but it does work marvelously well tho. Review Title: Marvelous “Messy” Mask Set Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: OGC Cosmetics Hair Mask Anti Frizz 8.5 Fl Oz - 250 Milliliters Review Date: 2022/05/22 Store: OGC Cosmetics Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'OGC Cosmetics', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Hair Type': 'Frizzy', 'Product Benefits': 'Frizz Control', 'Product Dimensions': '7.09 x 2.36 x 2.36 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'OGC Cosmetics'} Review Text: This product works perfectly well to reduce the frizz! It left my hair feeling soft, smooth and moisturized. It also smells great too. It’s lightweight so my hair didn’t feel weighed down or greasy.

Great OGC Anti-Frizz mask that works as described! Review Title: Goodbye Frizz! Smells & Works GREAT! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: YouClean 300 Antibacterial Travel Hand Soap Sheets - Pocket/Purse/Wallet/Backpack -Great for Outdoor Camping or Daily Use (Tea Party) (Tea Party) Review Date: 2022/07/18 Store: YouClean Product Description: ['Brand:', 'YouClean', 'Item Form:', 'Sheet', 'Formulation:', 'Concentrated plant-based soap', 'Scent:', 'Tea Party (Chamomile, Green Tea, Tea Tree)', 'Package Box Size:', '2 x 1 x 1.5 inch', 'www.shopyouclean.com', "We are changing our packaging. No more small plastic cases! Our new packaging is 100% biodegradable paper. All 300 sheets are tightly packed in 3 tiny paper boxes (100 sheets/box) which nicely fit in any purse/wallet, handbag, and kids' pack-backs. Check out our 9 scent collections: - Tea Party - Citrus Collection - Purple Heart - Pink Pamper - Red Passion - Blanca Elegance - Seaside Vacation - The Adventure - The Nonsense (unscented)"] Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'YouClean', 'Scent': 'Tea Party', 'Material Type Free': 'Plastic Free, Chemical Free (Not containing Sulfate, Phosphate, Paraffin, Phthalate, Gluten, Lead, Palm Oil and Mineral Oil)Plastic Free, Chemical Free (Not containing Sulfate, Phosphate, Paraffin, Phthalate, Gluten, Lead, Palm Oil and Mineral Oil) See more', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 1 x 1.25 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '609670421100', 'Manufacturer': 'YouClean'} Review Text: Now it definitely doesn’t get any more convenient than these handy YOUCLEAN Antibacterial Foaming Paper Hand Soap Sheets!

Each compact case holds 50 sheets which can be used while on the go with water! This set should have included 8pks, consisting of 400 sheets total. However, I only received 4 packs which consisted of just 200 sheets total.

Nevertheless, with the addition of water these sheets dissolve into hypoallergenic soap that actually lathers quite well. They’re mildly scented, compact, handy and they work to ensure “YOUCLEAN!” Review Title: Conveniently Handy Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: MRTREUP Elastic Bands For Wig 3Pcs Lace Melting Band Edge Band For Lace Front Wig, Hair Edge Wrap To Lay Edges , Edge Brush For Baby Hair Adjustable Wig Band Rail Tail Comb For Braided(Silver) Review Date: 2022/08/30 Store: MRTREUP Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Color': 'Silver', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Baby', 'Material': 'Latex', 'Fabric Type': 'lace', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Product Dimensions': '8 x 1.3 x 2 inches; 1.76 Ounces'} Review Text: These elastic bands are stretchy, comfy and stylish! I can definitely rock one of these elastic bands as a headband with all the bling and the comfortable elasticity. But my primary use for the bands are to lay & slay my edges! Also, the edge brush & rat tail comb are essential to parting & molding my baby hairs as well. This wig band set is a great addition to my hair styling tools. Review Title: “SLAY” Bands! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Full Shine Weft Hair Extensions Black Sew in Hair Extensions Color 1 Jet Black Weft Hair Bundle 24 Inch Human Hair Bundle 100 Gram Weave Weft Hair Extensions Real Human Hair for Women Remy Hair Review Date: 2022/09/26 Store: Full Shine Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Full Shine', 'Color': 'Black', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '24 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Product Dimensions': '24 x 4.72 x 1.38 inches; 6 Ounces'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:5a1712799d7c532e669519b43db5f757]] This Full Shine bundle is soft, silky with a beautiful luster. It looks and feels incredibly amazing! I’ve tried their human hair before and I’m pleased with the quality. I didn’t experience any shedding or tangling and it holds a curl perfectly! Great quality hair! Review Title: Looks & Feels AMAZING! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step: 1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences Remember to: - Focus only on keywords and trends supported by multiple interactions - Avoid repeating specific product names or details - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: ZILING Straight Lace Front Wigs Human Hair 4x4 Lace Closure Wigs for Black Women Pre Plucked 150% Density Brazilian Straight Lace Front Closure Wigs Human Hair 18 Inch Review Date: 2022/01/31 Store: ZILING Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Material': 'Human', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Tangle Free', 'Brand': 'ZILING', 'Package Dimensions': '11.34 x 9.06 x 2.48 inches; 6 Ounces'} Review Text: The hair is soft and layered so it feels more like 130 density. raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The purchase history reveals a strong preference for beauty and personal care products, particularly those emphasizing high-quality materials and performance. The individual displays a distinct appreciation for softness and comfort in both hair and makeup tools, favoring products that aid in achieving a flawless look. Ratings indicate a positive sentiment towards effective formulations, especially anti-aging and moisturizing properties in skincare, as evidenced by high ratings for multifunctional products.

Patterns suggest a desire for products solving specific beauty needs, including frizz control and anti-aging benefits, underlining a proactive approach to skincare and hair care. The buyer demonstrates a moderate price sensitivity, often opting for budget-friendly brands with satisfactory quality ratings (average ratings around 4.0), revealing a keen eye for value.

Common themes include a focus on natural or hypoallergenic ingredients, hinting at health-consciousness, and convenience, especially with portable items like travel soaps. Furthermore, the buyer appreciates aesthetic elements like packaging and design, suggesting a preference for visually appealing products. Overall, the individual is inclined towards versatile, effective beauty solutions that provide comfort, quality, and convenience, indicating a well-rounded approach to personal care.

target_interaction.title: Good quality & value
target_interaction.text: These Bodermincer Mink Eyelash Extensions are comfortable to wear, easy to apply and they’re so natural looking. The convenient closure case includes 192 clusters in various sizes ranging from 12-18mm in which I used the shorter lengths so they looked less dramatic and more subtle. This set of clusters are of good quality and a good value so I do recommend!
target_interaction.title_meta: Bodermincer Large Tray 192 Bundles Mink Eyelash Extension Natural 3D Russian Volume Faux Eyelashes Individual Cluster Lashes Makeup (12-14-16-18mm Mixed)

videos.title: I love them saving it for my bday in February can’t wait 🥰💅🏾
